product_page_short_description: Model: Apple Mac Mini M2 chip
full_description:
Apple Mac Mini M2 chip with 8-core Processor, 10-Core GPU, 8GB Memory, 256GB Storage

The Apple Mac mini is now equipped with Apple's pro-level M2 chip, making it suited for a variety of jobs like editing huge photos and 8K ProRes video as well as more demanding applications like immersive gaming and rich presentations. The Apple M2, which makes use of 2nd-Generation 5nm process technology, merges the CPU, GPU, Neural Engine, I/O, and more into a single system on a chip (SoC). Users will be able to concurrently playback up to two streams of 8K ProRes 422 video at 30 frames per second or up to 12 streams of 4K ProRes 422 video at 30 frames per second, which is an increase of up to 2.4x over the previous generation Mac mini with M2. Filter and function performance in Adobe Photoshop is also boosted up to 50%. This is possible thanks to the M2's faster next-generation CPU and GPU, higher bandwidth memory, and a more powerful media engine for improved performance and power efficiency that includes an advanced thermal system for greater sustained performance. Adding to the Mac mini's power is 8GB of RAM and, thanks to the addition of Wi-Fi 6E (802.11ax), wireless networking will operate at up to 2.4 Gb/s. The 10-Core GPU produces images that are crisp and clear, and you can export video to an external monitor using either the built-in HDMI port or the system's Thunderbolt 4 ports, which support native DisplayPort output. With one 6K/60Hz monitor using Thunderbolt 4 and a second 5K/60Hz display using Thunderbolt 4, or a 4K/60Hz display using HDMI, this Mac mini enables up to two simultaneous displays. A 256GB SSD is included in this Mac mini for file storage. There are two Thunderbolt 4 / USB 4 ports, 10 Gb/s USB 3.1 Gen 2 ports, charging ports, and power ports for external peripherals if you want to add external peripherals. There are still two 5 Gb/s USB 3.1 Gen 1 Type-A ports available for connecting additional devices to this machine. For wired networking, a Gigabit Ethernet connector is already there. Wi-Fi 6E (802.11ax) can be used for wireless access. You can connect more compatible devices, such as keyboards, mice, and headsets, using Bluetooth 5.3 technology. Using a 3.5mm headphone jack, the sound is output. An integrated 150W power supply that uses 100–240 VAC at 50–60 Hz powers Apple's Mac mini.

Buy Apple Mac Mini M2 chip with 8-core Processor 10-Core GPU 8GB Memory 256GB Storage from the best Apple Mac Mini Shop in BD

Apple Mac Mini M1 chip with 8-core Processor, 8-Core GPU, 512GB storage

The exclusiveApple M1 chip comes with 8-core Processor and 8-core GPU 512GB storage. This latest Apple M1 chip designed for a giant leap in CPU, GPU, and machine learning performance. The 8-core CPU featured with up to 3x faster performance to fly through workflows quicker than ever and also the 8-core GPU featured with up to 6x faster graphics for graphics-intensive apps and games; 16-core Neural Engine for advanced machine learning. Here, Advanced cooling system sustains breakthrough performance. It supports Next-generation Wi-Fi 6 (802.11ax Wi-Fi 6 wireless networking IEEE, 802.11a/b/g/n/ac compatible, Bluetooth 5.0 wireless technology) for faster connectivity with Two Thunderbolt / USB 4 ports with support for: DisplayPort, Thunderbolt 3 (up to 40 Gbps), USB 3.1 Gen 2 (up to 10 Gbps), Thunderbolt 2, HDMI, DVI, and VGA supported using adapters (sold separately), Two USB-A ports (up to 5 Gbps), HDMI 2.0 port, Gigabit Ethernet port (configurable to 10Gb Ethernet), 3.5 mm headphone jack and also the macOS Big Sur with a bold new design and major app updates for Safari, Messages, and Maps. This Apple Mac Mini comes with 01 year International warranty.

product_page_short_description: Model: Mac Mini M2 Pro chip
Apple M2 Pro 10-core CPU 16-core GPU, 16-core Neural Engine
full_description:
Apple Mac Mini M2 Pro chip with 10-core Processor 16-core GPU 16GB Memory 512GB Storage

The Apple Mac mini now has Apple's pro-level M2 Pro 10-Core CPU, making it ideal for everything from rich presentations to immersive gaming, as well as more intense jobs like large image processing and 8K ProRes film. The Apple M2 Pro combines the CPU, GPU, Neural Engine, I/O, and other components into a single system on a chip (SoC), this time using the 2nd-Gen 5nm manufacturing technology. When compared to the previous generation Mac mini with M1, users will be able to convert ProRes video in Final Cut Pro up to 4.2x quicker and playback up to five streams of 8K ProRes 422 video at 30 fps or up to 23 streams of 4K ProRes 422 video at 30 fps. It also provides up to 2.5x graphics performance in Affinity Pro. This is made possible by the M2 Pro's quicker next-generation CPU and GPU, higher bandwidth RAM, and a more powerful media engine for better performance and power efficiency, which features an upgraded cooling system for longer-lasting performance. The Apple Mac mini has 16GB of RAM and, owing to the addition of Wi-Fi 6E (802.11ax), wireless networking can run at up to 2.4 Gb/s. The 16-Core GPU produces a clean, clear image, and you can export video to an external monitor via the system's Thunderbolt 4 ports, which support native DisplayPort output, or through the built-in HDMI connector. This Mac mini can handle up to three monitors at once, including two 6K 60 Hz displays via Thunderbolt and one 4K / 60 Hz display via HDMI. Alternatively, connect one 6K / 60 Hz and one 4K / 144 Hz display via Thunderbolt. For even higher resolution and refresh rates, this Mac mini supports one 8K / 60 Hz display or one 4K / 240 Hz monitor. This Mac mini includes a 512GB SSD to save your files. If you wish to connect external peripherals, there are four Thunderbolt 4 / USB4 connections that offer bidirectional transfer speeds of up to 40 Gb/s, as well as a 10 Gb/s USB 3.1 Gen 2 connector that charges and powers external devices. This system still has two 5 Gb/s USB 3.1 Gen 1 Type-A ports, allowing you to attach more devices. Wired networking is supported by a Gigabit Ethernet port, while wireless connectivity is provided by Wi-Fi 6E (802.11ax). Bluetooth 5.3 technology enables you to connect more compatible devices, such as keyboards, mice, and headsets. Sound is supplied using a 3.5mm headphone connector. Apple's Mac mini has an inbuilt 185W power supply that works on 100-240 VAC at 50 to 60 Hz.
